title: free/shareware font similar to Prelo Bold
content: Does anyone know of a free or shareware font that is similar to Prelo Bold? [http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=4345775](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043701/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=4345775 "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=4345775")
author: xjustinx

comments.content:
How similar is similar enough? DejaVu Sans Bold is wide, sans-serif, and free.

[http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main\_Page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043701/http:/dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page "http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main\_Page")

I'd say that looks close enough. I'm making a limited record cover for my band's new record that is a take off on another old record of a local band. I've already got the band logo in check, and now I just need to match the record title font on the right hand side:  
http://www.spirit-of-metal.com/les%20goupes/P/Poison%20Idea/War%20All%20the%20Time/War%20All%20the%20Time.jpg

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/front_6286.jpg)
